ComicInfo.Summary:
The residents of Blackwell face the music as they navigate a new and uncertain world. With the Elders no longer in power, a new generation takes charge. But they quickly discover that the universe is a big place as they attempt to find their way back to Earth.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tom Mandrake & Kim Mohan | 1 | B | Cover B | Charles Wilson III | 2 | C | Cover C | Photo | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Tom Mandrake & Kim Mohan | 4 | E/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Charles Wilson III | 5 | F/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Photo" Edition Variant Cover | Photo | 6 |
